kaer_morhen_steel_sword.name: Kaer Morhen Steel Sword
kaer_morhen_steel_sword.description: A well-tempered steel blade from Kaer Morhen. Good vs humans and beasts.

steel_sword_basic.name: Basic Steel Sword
steel_sword_basic.description: An ordinary steel sword. Reliable and cheap.

kaer_morhen_silver_sword.name: Kaer Morhen Silver Sword
kaer_morhen_silver_sword.description: Forged to fight monsters — silver cuts through many unnatural defenses.

silver_sword_basic.name: Basic Silver Sword
silver_sword_basic.description: A simple silver blade — effective against many monsters.

kaer_morhen_armor.name: Kaer Morhen Armor
kaer_morhen_armor.description: Sturdy armor issued at Kaer Morhen. Excellent protection without too much weight.

kaer_morhen_boots.name: Kaer Morhen Boots
kaer_morhen_boots.description: Boots worn by witchers — comfortable and protective.

viper_basic_armor.name: Viper Basic Armor
viper_basic_armor.description: Sturdy leather armor reinforced with metal plates, favored by witchers of the Viper School.

viper_basic_gauntlets.name: Viper Basic Gauntlets
viper_basic_gauntlets.description: Simple but durable gloves that improve grip and slightly boost protection.

viper_basic_trousers.name: Viper Basic Trousers
viper_basic_trousers.description: Lightweight trousers that allow for flexibility in combat without sacrificing too much protection.

viper_basic_boots.name: Viper Basic Boots
viper_basic_boots.description: Witcher-grade boots designed for long treks and swift movement.

potion_small.name: Small Health Potion
potion_small.description: Restores a small amount of vitality.

potion_medium.name: Greater Health Potion
potion_medium.description: Restores a moderate amount of vitality.

potion_greater.name: Superior Health Potion
potion_greater.description: Large restorative potion. Expensive, but saves lives.

hybrid_oil.name: Hybrid Oil
hybrid_oil.description: Applied to silver swords — increases damage against hybrid monsters.

necrophage_oil.name: Necrophage Oil
necrophage_oil.description: Increases silver sword effectiveness against necrophages.

specter_oil.name: Specter Oil
specter_oil.description: Helpful against specters and wraiths when applied to silver blades.

relict_oil.name: Relict Oil
relict_oil.description: Powerful oil used against ancient and relict creatures.

wyvern_scale.name: Wyvern Scale
wyvern_scale.description: A tough scale from a wyvern. Useful for crafting.

leshen_root.name: Leshen Root
leshen_root.description: A mysterious root possessing druidic properties; used in alchemy.

ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm
ectoplasm.description: Remnant of a specter — used in crafting and alchemy.
